alfredsnippet.snippet:
" general
" use Ctrl-key in insert mode for navigate
" donot try to remap <C-h>, sometimes it's <backspace>.
inoremap <C-e> <C-o>$
inoremap <C-a> <C-o>^

inoremap jj <esc>
inoremap <s-tab> <c-n>
nnoremap 0 ^

let mapleader = " "
nnoremap <leader><cr> :noh<cr>
nnoremap <leader>p :set paste!<cr>
nnoremap <leader>n :set number!<cr>
nnoremap <leader>w :w<cr>
nnoremap <leader>q :wq<cr>
alfredsnippet.name: vimrc shortcuts
